storyInfo: Forced to return to Leithanien, Ebenholz is pursued by Witch King cultists. The Gendarmerie commander and Federico approach the scene of the fight. Federico investigates the sound of a cello playing, but Arturia's true target is the commander.

attributes.content: Once upon a time, there was a child who was imprisoned in an old, old tower.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The script of his life had been written from the moment of his birth. Like an opera, every aria, every scene was meticulously planned, and all he could do was follow it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: One day, the child realized that he was part of the show.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It was all a masquerade. Love, hate, resentment, everything around him was fake.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Confused, frightened, and angry, he called the score 'fate,' and tried to resist it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: At one point, he even thought he had succeeded in escaping from the stage.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But he forgot that freedom granted by another can never be true freedom. When the threads of fate tightened again, there was nowhere for him to go except back on stage.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But this time, he chose to fight.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The show would go on. He would struggle for the benefit of the audience in the seats. Still, he thought he could at least glare back at them, and scorn the fate that they had imposed upon him.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But he often wonders... if he was still in the play, how can he tell where the stage ends, and the audience begins?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And if all of us are part of a play like he is, how would we know when it truly ends?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Poor kid! Will he get out? Will he become a hero and defeat the bad guy?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: A hero... Sadly, not everyone can be a hero. Given enough time, some heroes stop being heroes, or even become villains.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: That's not the kinda story I want to hear!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Alright, alright... let's start from even earlier in the story then. That way, we won't get to the ending you don't want to hear today.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Nein! Hurry it up already!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: You guys like playing at Forest Park, don't you?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Did you know that it wasn't actually built to commemorate the heroes who died resisting the Witch King?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Gustav Park was built to commemorate the deeds of a great ruler.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And in his story, he was a 'hero' too.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Huff... huff... hah...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Oh, so that's how it is. If it isn't my old friends.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I knew it didn't make any sense for Their Majesties to go through the trouble of bringing me back and sparing my life for a few days, only to send assassins.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You are the key to the plan, Graf Urtica.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Yes, yes, we've all heard this one before.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Have you learned nothing from what happened with Gertrude? All that effort, and not even the ruins of a concert hall to show for it.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What do you want from me this time? To blow up the park above us?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Gräfin Strollo's failure was born of ignorance. She and the original experimenters were nothing but useless rabble.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: They knew His Majesty's melody, but not how to play it properly, and foolishly sought to use it as a weapon to spread the calamity of Originium.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Such uncouth violence is an affront to art. Even if he had awakened from it, he would have sentenced them to death for their blasphemy.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Ha, of course. So you're saying that Gertrude was a fraud, but you're the real deal?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Then... what? You need me to appeal to Their Majesties to bestow you a medal proving your commitment to the arts?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: We seek only your understanding.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: You are His Majesty's heir, the symbol of his glory, the manifestation of his flesh and blood, and the continuation of his melody.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: We believe that you will bring glory back to Urtica, and to Leithanien.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: ...Then do it.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Take back his glory, his flesh and blood, his melody.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I wonder though... Without those, what would be left of the individual known as 'Ebenholz'?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Perhaps it is your infection, or perhaps the result of Rhodes Island's training.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: You've certainly become stronger.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: And yet... you show not even a sliver of His Majesty's strength.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: I... I must go...
attributes.name: Stubborn Apprentice

attributes.content: Freeze.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Stubborn Apprentice

attributes.content: Take another step, and I'll have you arrested.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But I haven't—
attributes.name: Stubborn Apprentice

attributes.content: You haven't formally joined those lunatics yet? Good for you.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: They're no lunatics! Maybe you see His Majesty's reign as one of terror, but all he did was punish the nobles who stood in the way of progress!
attributes.name: Stubborn Apprentice

attributes.content: Why am I not allowed to miss him? Why can't I long for a Leithanien where someone like me could become somebody?
attributes.name: Stubborn Apprentice

attributes.content: ...Because I know that era better than you do.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Listen, junge. When I first came to Leithanien, I accidentally stepped on a poster on the ground.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Every other person on the street was probably a spy. I was a trader from Laterano at the time, and they planned to execute me as a 'subversive foreign element.'
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You could have contacted the Notarial Hall or the Seventh Tribunal.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Certainly, Reverend Executor. Just like you could have broken into the most heavily-guarded Arts jail on your own and rescued me.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But like most Sankta, your wings are ornamental, not functional.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Leithanien is more than a stone's throw from Laterano. Not even you could have helped a Liberi who was scheduled to be executed the very next day.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But you survived, and became Leithanian.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Because someone saved my life.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: A limping old Liberi, a soldier who'd killed a few Gauls in his time. He later joined the Gendarmerie, essentially the Witch King's secret police at the time.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: He took pity on me and got me out. I'm told the executioner got a fancy new cigarette case for his trouble.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Only a few days later, the Witch King executed another batch of dissidents, right here in this park.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: And when I looked up from the crowd, can you guess whose face I saw among the twisted statues?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Are you scared? You should be.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Go home, junge, and don't ever get involved in these things again.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: We should go too, Reverend Executor.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You've also detected the use of Arts. Someone is fighting.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'll let the Empresses' Voice know. Let them worry about it.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: We will miss our chance to apprehend the criminal.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: When will you understand? I don't want that chance.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: If I strolled into that park, I'd find a group of masked people calling themselves the 'Echoes of Herkunftshorn.'
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: And Their Majesties would certainly expect me to draw my weapon and arrest or kill them.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But do you know whose faces I'd see when I removed their masks?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Perhaps the heir of a Graf, or the scion of a Kurfürst.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: As for me? If I'm lucky enough to survive, I'd be sent straight back to jail. This battle in the park? Ha! It'd go down as nothing more than a little brawl over some private grudge.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Just like Jan's sister, Yulia. I tried to catch the last bastard to see her, but couldn't touch a hair on his head because of his father's title, his family, and the Kaiserinnen's intervention!
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: An enforcer of the law should act only in accordance with the law, not his own interests.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Since when has the law cared about a man's life or death?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The law allows you to leave a last will and testament. If you are killed in battle, I will see it executed to the letter.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...You have one twisted sense of humor.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But that reminds me, when I joined the uprising against the Witch King and attacked the Spire, I truly believed that I'd leave something behind, even in death.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But look at me now. An alcoholic who spends his days taking bribes and bowing to high nobles.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You're absolutely right, I'm not fit to enforce the law. I bet the old man who saved me is rolling in his grave.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The events of the past should not cloud your judgment of the present.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You could not save that girl named Yulia, but you saved her brother. And you have the chance to save someone else.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I envy you, Reverend Executor. Back when I left Laterano, I thought the Sankta were hard to understand. But now I realize that there's no one simpler.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But... are the laws of Laterano always correct?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I have in fact encountered a case like the one you mentioned.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The case I am pursuing right now. It is very special to me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Her actions have seriously threatened the order of Laterano. The outcome is clearly wrong, yet she has continued to escape the law's judgment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do you ever feel doubt, then? Disappointment?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: In my experience, disappointment is born from having previously held strong positive feelings towards something.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Which you never had?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You're... different from the other Sankta I know. You've never loved Laterano, have you?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I do not believe such sentiments to be necessary to perform my duties.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Maybe you're right.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Or maybe, when you're finally forced to doubt yourself, and find yourself wavering, lost, like me... you'll realize that you need a strength, a reason.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: And that's when you'll discover that the law offers no guidance.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I hear a cello. The target is just ahead.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you refuse to follow, I will proceed to the suspect's location and complete the mission myself.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I would prefer to have the cooperation of the Gendarmerie.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Not my problem. I need to head back and hand over my resignation to the city council. Don't worry, I'll pass the documents you gave me along to my successor before I leave Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I do not believe that the former hero is dead, Loris Bordin.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: After all, you're standing right in front of me. Accurately determining a person's life or death is part of my job.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...Seriously?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The target isn't here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This cello tune...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You see the sculptures spraying water? Their Arts have been modified to reproduce her performance.
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: Why are you pointing that at me, Sankta? Have you lost your mind?!
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: Marigold Alley, Forest Park... You have been at the scene of every incident.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your behavior is abnormal for a Leithanian of your age.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The evidence provides plenty of reason to suspect you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And that's why you're pointing a gun at me? Did it ever occur to you that I could be on your side?
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: When dealing with someone attempting to hide their identity, detention followed by interrogation is the most efficient option.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're even less flexible than a statue tuned by the worst caster!
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: I was wondering who this trap was for. Any Leithanian child off the street could've told you this wasn't a live performance.
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: Whoever set it must know you well. She knew you'd come after the sound of a cello like a hungry tuskbeast pouncing on a piece of meat, ignoring everything else.
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: Giving her an opening to approach her real target.
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: ...Loris Bordin.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That spineless Gendarmerie commander? Why bring him up?
attributes.name: Serene Apprentice

attributes.content: Your assessment is correct, Arturia lured me away. It is Loris Bordin she wants.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Thiem? It's me. Is Jan back yet?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Okay, good.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Tell him I'm very sorry about his sister... about Yulia.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I'm leaving Leithanien soon. The leads I've collected over the years are in my house in Bodenshof. The key's in the wallet I gave you. Give it to Jan.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Hopefully... someone will take over the case after I'm gone.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I've been pursuing it for so long now. I couldn't get a result, but maybe someone else can.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: ...This is a bigger commotion than the previous ones.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Pym? I'm near Forest Park. There's a situation here. Get a team over... no, one team might not be enough. Get everyone you can.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Yeah, it's probably those masked schurken. Maybe they set fire under the asses of a pack of gloompincers in order to blow up the sewers.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Let's just hope no unlucky bastard gets caught up in the mess.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Music?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Who's there? ...A Sankta?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Reverend Executor? Is that you?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The events of the past should not cloud your judgment of the present.
attributes.name: 'Federico'

attributes.content: You could not save that girl named Yulia, but you saved her brother. And you have the chance to save someone else.
attributes.name: 'Federico'

attributes.content: ...An illusion? No, just a memory.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Oh, Pym. No, it's nothing. There's only me here. It's just that I was reminded of something.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Ja, the bastards are right below me. I'll leave a beacon here.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Ja, I know, it's dangerous. I'll keep my distance.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Run away with your tail between your legs, meine Herr. Whatever courage you once had is ancient history.
attributes.name: 'Stubborn Apprentice'

attributes.content: 'The first soldier to set foot in the Witch King's Spire'—do you really think you're still that same hero?
attributes.name: 'Stubborn Apprentice'

attributes.content: Get out of my head, you asshole.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: No, I wasn't talking to you, Pym. Time to move. I'm gonna hang up.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: ...I know better than anyone that I'm a coward. I couldn't find out how Yulia died. Couldn't even take revenge for her.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Yulia... Yulia.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: What would you say if you saw me now?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You were always so warm and gentle. Maybe you wouldn't let your disappointment show.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Don't hang your head, junge.
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: Hey there, old man. Now it's your turn to pop out of my memories, huh?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You're not too quick on the uptake, but you've got guts. Not many could look a picture of the Witch King in the eye, let alone step on it.
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: I was just an unlucky bastard who happened to walk by. Was it really worth losing your life over someone like me?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Don't feel like you owe me anything.
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: Did you really think I was going to die in bed, after working for the Witch King for so many years?
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: Letting you go just helped me sleep at night for once, for the last few days of my life.
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: Same goes for you, junge. If you feel guilty, then try saving a few more lives before you go.
attributes.name: 'Gendarmerie'

attributes.content: The Liberi limps away and disappears into the shadow beneath the sun.
It's a long one, like the one the Spire cast all those years ago.
Many lives faded into those shadows, with not a soul to gaze upon them. It was how things were, and how they still are.
The cello music fades away.
Only the tremors beneath his feet remain. He knows they are the sounds of innocent souls struggling for life.
He could stay put.
He could leave Leithanien like he left Laterano.
All he'd need to do is turn around and leave, like he's done for decades now. So much easier than leading the charge, no?
I'm tired, old man.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I want to live. Not just that, but to drink freshly brewed beer every day, to listen to jazz with Pym and the boys after work, and to take a trip to Sami next summer.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I... couldn't die a hero like you did.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But why...
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Why...
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Why am I disappointed?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You're tired, young Graf.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Huff... hah...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Oripathy eats away at you. If you continue to use your Arts, only death awaits.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: And... are you afraid of that?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I fear only what we must do to stop you.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Mmph—Argh!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: My... head... hurts...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: We do not wish to harm you.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: But the Concertmaster says that the melody within you is more valuable than your mind.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: We will... put you to sleep for a while, if need be.
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: You want to wipe my mind...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I... won't... let...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Arrrgghhh!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: A Liberi... in a Gendarmerie uniform?
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Just one?
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Trying to be a hero, are you?
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: 'Go. My men are on their way.'
He hears the stranger say to him.
Dan... ke.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't let him get away!
attributes.name: 'Witch King's Echo'

attributes.content: Ebenholz knows he will not get another chance.
Blood drips down from a corner of his mouth. His head is splitting.
The battle behind him continues. He wants to see the face of his hero, but the tiny silhouette is quickly engulfed in light from Arts and explosions.
All he can do is run.
He keeps running.
He knows not where this path leads, nor the effort it will take to escape its predestined end.
